question: Article 74, 75, 78 deal broadly with which of the following?
option1: Relationship between Prime Minister and president
option2: Relationship between Governor and Chief Ministers
option3: Size and nature of the council
answer: Relationship between Prime Minister and president
explanation: Article 74, 75, 78 of the Indian constitution deals with the relationship between Prime Minister and President. These articles mention that the Prime minister with council of ministers shall be appointed, to advice the President.
